<webtest namedynamic property test> <config ... /> <steps> <invoke ... /> <verifyProperty descriptionVerify dynamic property dynProp contains the word 'Warning' namedynProp text.*Warning.* regextrue /> </steps> </webtest>
<webtest nameant property test> <config ... /> ... ant tasks which may set ant property ... <steps> ... script or groovy statements which may set ant property ... <verifyProperty descriptionVerify ant property antProp contains the word 'Warning' nameantProp propertyTypeant text.*Warning.* regextrue /> </steps> </webtest>
